stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, for each hosted advancement counter, gain 3 credits and the Runner loses 2 credits.
text:
You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, for each hosted advancement counter, gain 3[credit] and the Runner loses 2[credit].
title: Idiosyncresis
